name: Tenco
description:
Card-based game where  you have  to take care of a cat and eat taco to regain energy.

  • At the start of the turn you will be given 4 cards,  you have to remove one of them
  • Then you have to pick one card that will be player
  • Each card has activities that will change your score and  your energy
  • Every time you play non-taco card the points you gain will be multiplied

Made for Weekly Jam 121. Theme : Taco Cat.
